name: Demon's Run
description:
Demon's Run is a multiplayer shooter, play as the most terrifying beings throughout space and time and fight to control unique battlefields.
Join our official discord server below to find players and chat with devs.
Lobby's currently support 12v12 well in this head to head ability shooter featuring first and third person switchable perspectives, A variety of playable characters, and modifiable loadouts. Go head to head in Free For All, TDM, CTF, Domination, Rush, or Kill Confirmed.
